feature.name: lvef
feature.path: (Observation.component.where(code.coding.system='http://loinc.org' and code.coding.code='79990-8') | Observation.component.where(code.coding.system='http://loinc.org' and code.coding.code='79991-6') | Observation.component.where(code.coding.system='http://loinc.org' and (code.coding.code='77890-2' or code.coding.code='93645-0' or code.coding.code='93644-3')) | Observation.component.where(code.coding.system='http://loinc.org' and (code.coding.code='79992-4' or code.coding.code='79993-2' or code.coding.code='8807-0')) | Observation.component.where(code.coding.system='http://loinc.org' and (code.coding.code='77891-0' or code.coding.code='8806-2' or code.coding.code='18049-7'))).valueQuantity.value.first()
